titles.title: My Restless Soul Grows Weary Of The Fire

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My restless soul grows weary of the fire
Considering only pain, the heat, the loss.
Never remembering that the dear Refiner
Hovers near to remove each bit of dross.
Chorus:
For He sits as a refiner and purifier of silver
And He shall purify the sons of Levi.
He shall purge than as gold and as silver
That they may offer righteousness unto the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He watches gently through each tribulation
As He brings self-life ever to the test.
And when at last He sees His Face reflected,
The fire is gone and O the rest, sweet rest.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Think not that He desires to bring us testings
To cause us sorrow, anguish, grief, and pain.
He sees beyond each earthly trial to glory
And knows that our self-loss is our eternal gain.
